commit message: Show lager grid for landscape tablets with only one fragment visible
On tablets show main's albums on own since they can fully use space
On tablets show the search fragment as the origin
Fix artist header not changing when already on artist fragment and switching offline
Add menu for video podcasts for podcast specific functions
Fix getCachedImage returning a recycled bitmap
Keep bitmaps in the notification from being recycled
Fix swapping position of download files not sticking until refresh due to not moving in local list immediately
Fix if isExternalStorageRemovable throws (appears to have been due to testing against a external usb stick?)
